articles.author: Caitlin Tilley
articles.title: The anti-inflammatory drug that could reverse the aging process - Daily Mail
articles.description: Scientists knew they could rejuvenate old blood via infusion. Now researchers from Columbia University in New York might have found a way to refresh old blood without taking it from other people.
articles.content:
An arthritis drug might hold the key to reversing aging, researchers say.
